qas.question: What document labeled the the description of the citizenship policy of Estonia as "discriminatory"?

answers.text: The 2008 United Nations Human Rights Council report

qas.question: What percentage of Estonian Russians have though of going back to Russia?
What proportion of Estonian Russians see themselves as different from their Russian counterparts?

context: <a0_0>The 2008 United Nations Human Rights Council report<a0_0/> called "extremely credible" the description of the citizenship policy of Estonia as "discriminatory". According to surveys, only <a1_0>5%<a1_0/> of the Russian community have considered returning to Russia in the near future. Estonian Russians have developed their own identity – <a2_0>more than half<a2_0/> of the respondents recognised that Estonian Russians differ noticeably from the Russians in Russia. When comparing the result with a survey from 2000, then Russians' attitude toward the future is much more positive.
